existing_features.title: When the user clicks the "Save to Memories" button in the Congrats (MonthlyCompletionCelebrationModal) modal, immediately hide/close the modal and then show a pop-up notification for 3 seconds confirming the save.

new_feature_requests.summary: In the Congrats modal, when user clicks 'Save to Memories', hide the modal and show a pop-up notification for 3 seconds.

projectName: Close Congrats modal on Save to Memories and show 3-second pop-up notification
